document.full_text: mexican investigators have found a total of 116 bodies in pits near the border with the united states, 28 more than previously reported, attorney general marisela morales said.
document.title: mexico reports 28 more bodies in pits near u.s. border
lines_and_colors: mexican investigators have found a total of 116 bodies in pits near the border with the united states, 28 more than previously reported, attorney general marisela morales said.
